optOut.title: Matomo Analytics Opt-Out
optOut.description: Here you can disable the Matomo web analytics tool for this website.
optOut.info: We use Matomo to analyze visitor behavior on our website. Your privacy is important to us.
optOut.cookieless: This website uses privacy-friendly tracking without cookies. No opt-out is required.
optOut.disabled: Web analytics is disabled on this website.
